return {
  json: {
    timestamp: $json.timestamp,
    src_port: $json.src_port,
    dst_port: $json.dst_port,
    protocol: $json.protocol,

    idle_std: $json.idle_std,
    idle_max: $json.idle_max,
    idle_min: $json.idle_min
  }
};

return {
  stat_graph_features: [
    item.json['Src Port'],
    item.json['Dst Port'],
    item.json['Protocol'],
    item.json['Flow Duration'],
    item.json['Total Fwd Packet'],
    item.json['Total Bwd packets'],
    item.json['Total Length of Fwd Packet'],
    item.json['Total Length of Bwd Packet'],
    item.json['Fwd Packet Length Max'],
    item.json['Fwd Packet Length Min'],
    item.json['Fwd Packet Length Mean'],
    item.json['Fwd Packet Length Std'],
    item.json['Bwd Packet Length Max'],
    item.json['Bwd Packet Length Min'],
    item.json['Bwd Packet Length Mean'],
    item.json['Bwd Packet Length Std'],
    item.json['Flow Bytes/s'],
    item.json['Flow Packets/s'],
    item.json['Fwd PSH Flags'],
    item.json['Bwd PSH Flags'],
    item.json['Fwd URG Flags'],
    item.json['Bwd URG Flags'],
    item.json['Fwd Header Length'],
    item.json['Bwd Header Length'],
    item.json['Fwd Packets/s'],
    item.json['Bwd Packets/s'],
    item.json['Packet Length Min'],
    item.json['Packet Length Max'],
    item.json['Packet Length Mean'],
    item.json['Packet Length Std'],
    item.json['Packet Length Variance'],
    item.json['FIN Flag Count'],
    item.json['SYN Flag Count'],
    item.json['RST Flag Count'],
    item.json['PSH Flag Count'],
    item.json['ACK Flag Count'],
    item.json['URG Flag Count'],
    item.json['CWR Flag Count'],
    item.json['ECE Flag Count'],
    item.json['Down/Up Ratio'],
    item.json['Average Packet Size'],
    item.json['Fwd Segment Size Avg'],
    item.json['Bwd Segment Size Avg'],
    item.json['Fwd Bytes/Bulk Avg'],
    item.json['Fwd Packet/Bulk Avg'],
    item.json['Fwd Bulk Rate Avg'],
    item.json['Bwd Bytes/Bulk Avg'],
    item.json['Bwd Packet/Bulk Avg'],
    item.json['Bwd Bulk Rate Avg'],
    item.json['Subflow Fwd Packets'],
    item.json['Subflow Fwd Bytes'],
    item.json['Subflow Bwd Packets'],
    item.json['Subflow Bwd Bytes'],
    item.json['FWD Init Win Bytes'],
    item.json['Bwd Init Win Bytes'],
    item.json['Fwd Act Data Pkts'],
    item.json['Fwd Seg Size Min'],
    item.json['Active Mean'],
    item.json['Active Std'],
    item.json['Active Max'],
    item.json['Active Min'],
    item.json['Idle Mean'],
    item.json['Idle Std'],
    item.json['Idle Max'],
    item.json['Idle Min'],
    item.json['Hour'],
    item.json['Day'],
    item.json['Weekday']
  ],
  temporal_features: [
    item.json['Flow IAT Mean'],
    item.json['Flow IAT Std'],
    item.json['Flow IAT Max'],
    item.json['Flow IAT Min'],
    item.json['Fwd IAT Total'],
    item.json['Fwd IAT Mean'],
    item.json['Fwd IAT Std'],
    item.json['Fwd IAT Max'],
    item.json['Fwd IAT Min'],
    item.json['Bwd IAT Total'],
    item.json['Bwd IAT Mean'],
    item.json['Bwd IAT Std'],
    item.json['Bwd IAT Max'],
    item.json['Bwd IAT Min']
  ]
};

return {
  src_ip: $("Extract from File").first().json.src_ip,
  dst_ip: $("Extract from File").first().json.dst_ip,
  src_port: $("Extract from File").first().json.src_port,
  dst_port: $("Extract from File").first().json.dst_port,
  protocol: $("Extract from File").first().json.protocol,
  attack_label: $('Code5').first().json.predicted_class_dos,
  attack_type: "DOS",
  probability: $('DOS Model1').first().json.confidence,
}

parameters.message: =CyberShield Alert: {{ $json.attack_type }} - {{ $json.attack_name }} Src IP: {{ $json.src_ip }}, Dst IP: {{ $json.dst_ip }} Protocol: {{ $json.protocol }}, Risk: {{ $json.threat_level }}

parameters.jsCode:
// Credentials
const supabaseUrl = $('Supabase credentials').first().json.supabase_url;
const supabaseKey = $('Supabase credentials').first().json.supabase_key;

// Prepare transformed output for all 50 items
const output = $items("Extract from File").map(item => {
  const source = item.json;
  const toNum = val => Number(val || 0.0);

  const row = {
    src_ip: source.src_ip || '',
    dst_ip: source.dst_ip || '',
    src_port: toNum(source.src_port),
    dst_port: toNum(source.dst_port),
    protocol: source.protocol || '',
    flow_duration: toNum(source.flow_duration),
    label: toNum(source.label),
    attack_type: source.attack_type || 'unknown',
    prob: toNum(source.prob),
    tot_fwd_pkts: toNum(source.tot_fwd_pkts),
    tot_bwd_pkts: toNum(source.tot_bwd_pkts),
    totlen_fwd_pkts: toNum(source.totlen_fwd_pkts),
    totlen_bwd_pkts: toNum(source.totlen_bwd_pkts),
    fwd_pkt_len_max: toNum(source.fwd_pkt_len_max),
    fwd_pkt_len_min: toNum(source.fwd_pkt_len_min),
    fwd_pkt_len_mean: toNum(source.fwd_pkt_len_mean),
    fwd_pkt_len_std: toNum(source.fwd_pkt_len_std),
    bwd_pkt_len_max: toNum(source.bwd_pkt_len_max),
    bwd_pkt_len_min: toNum(source.bwd_pkt_len_min),
    bwd_pkt_len_mean: toNum(source.bwd_pkt_len_mean),
    bwd_pkt_len_std: toNum(source.bwd_pkt_len_std),
    flow_byts_s: toNum(source.flow_byts_s),
    flow_pkts_s: toNum(source.flow_pkts_s),
    flow_iat_mean: toNum(source.flow_iat_mean),
    flow_iat_std: toNum(source.flow_iat_std),
    flow_iat_max: toNum(source.flow_iat_max),
    flow_iat_min: toNum(source.flow_iat_min),
    fwd_iat_tot: toNum(source.fwd_iat_tot),
    fwd_iat_mean: toNum(source.fwd_iat_mean),
    fwd_iat_std: toNum(source.fwd_iat_std),
    fwd_iat_max: toNum(source.fwd_iat_max),
    fwd_iat_min: toNum(source.fwd_iat_min),
    bwd_iat_tot: toNum(source.bwd_iat_tot),
    bwd_iat_mean: toNum(source.bwd_iat_mean),
    bwd_iat_std: toNum(source.bwd_iat_std),
    bwd_iat_max: toNum(source.bwd_iat_max),
    bwd_iat_min: toNum(source.bwd_iat_min),
    fwd_psh_flags: toNum(source.fwd_psh_flags),
    bwd_psh_flags: toNum(source.bwd_psh_flags),
    fwd_urg_flags: toNum(source.fwd_urg_flags),
    bwd_urg_flags: toNum(source.bwd_urg_flags),
    fwd_header_len: toNum(source.fwd_header_len),
    bwd_header_len: toNum(source.bwd_header_len),
    fwd_pkts_s: toNum(source.fwd_pkts_s),
    bwd_pkts_s: toNum(source.bwd_pkts_s),
    pkt_len_min: toNum(source.pkt_len_min),
    pkt_len_max: toNum(source.pkt_len_max),
    pkt_len_mean: toNum(source.pkt_len_mean),
    pkt_len_std: toNum(source.pkt_len_std),
    pkt_len_var: toNum(source.pkt_len_var),
    fin_flag_cnt: toNum(source.fin_flag_cnt),
    syn_flag_cnt: toNum(source.syn_flag_cnt),
    rst_flag_cnt: toNum(source.rst_flag_cnt),
    psh_flag_cnt: toNum(source.psh_flag_cnt),
    ack_flag_cnt: toNum(source.ack_flag_cnt),
    urg_flag_cnt: toNum(source.urg_flag_cnt),
    cwr_flag_cnt: toNum(source.cwr_flag_cnt),
    ece_flag_cnt: toNum(source.ece_flag_cnt),
    down_up_ratio: toNum(source.down_up_ratio),
    pkt_size_avg: toNum(source.pkt_size_avg),
    fwd_seg_size_avg: toNum(source.fwd_seg_size_avg),
    bwd_seg_size_avg: toNum(source.bwd_seg_size_avg),
    fwd_byts_b_avg: toNum(source.fwd_byts_b_avg),
    fwd_pkts_b_avg: toNum(source.fwd_pkts_b_avg),
    fwd_blk_rate_avg: toNum(source.fwd_blk_rate_avg),
    bwd_byts_b_avg: toNum(source.bwd_byts_b_avg),
    bwd_pkts_b_avg: toNum(source.bwd_pkts_b_avg),
    bwd_blk_rate_avg: toNum(source.bwd_blk_rate_avg),
    subflow_fwd_pkts: toNum(source.subflow_fwd_pkts),
    subflow_fwd_byts: toNum(source.subflow_fwd_byts),
    subflow_bwd_pkts: toNum(source.subflow_bwd_pkts),
    subflow_bwd_byts: toNum(source.subflow_bwd_byts),
    fwd_init_win_bytes: toNum(source.fwd_init_win_bytes),
    bwd_init_win_bytes: toNum(source.bwd_init_win_bytes),
    fwd_act_data_pkts: toNum(source.fwd_act_data_pkts),
    fwd_seg_size_min: toNum(source.fwd_seg_size_min),
    active_mean: toNum(source.active_mean),
    active_std: toNum(source.active_std),
    active_max: toNum(source.active_max),
    active_min: toNum(source.active_min),
    idle_mean: toNum(source.idle_mean),
    idle_std: toNum(source.idle_std),
    idle_max: toNum(source.idle_max),
    idle_min: toNum(source.idle_min),
    hour: toNum(source.hour),
    day: toNum(source.day),
    weekday: toNum(source.weekday),
    label: $('APT Model2').first().json.prediction ?? null,
    attack_type: "APT"
  };

  return {
    json: {
      supabase_url: supabaseUrl,
      supabase_key: supabaseKey,
      table: "all_traffic_data",
      payload: row
    }
  };
});

// Return an array of 50 items
return output;

// Credentials
const supabaseUrl = $('Supabase credentials').first().json.supabase_url;
const supabaseKey = $('Supabase credentials').first().json.supabase_key;

// Prepare transformed output for all 50 items

    fwd_seg_size_avg: toNum(source.fwd_seg_size_avg),
    bwd_seg_size_avg: toNum(source.bwd_seg_size_avg),
    fwd_byts_b_avg: toNum(source.fwd_byts_b_avg),
    fwd_pkts_b_avg: toNum(source.fwd_pkts_b_avg),
    fwd_blk_rate_avg: toNum(source.fwd_blk_rate_avg),
    bwd_byts_b_avg: toNum(source.bwd_byts_b_avg),
    bwd_pkts_b_avg: toNum(source.bwd_pkts_b_avg),
    bwd_blk_rate_avg: toNum(source.bwd_blk_rate_avg),
    subflow_fwd_pkts: toNum(source.subflow_fwd_pkts),
    subflow_fwd_byts: toNum(source.subflow_fwd_byts),
    subflow_bwd_pkts: toNum(source.subflow_bwd_pkts),
    subflow_bwd_byts: toNum(source.subflow_bwd_byts),
    fwd_init_win_bytes: toNum(source.fwd_init_win_bytes),
    bwd_init_win_bytes: toNum(source.bwd_init_win_bytes),
    fwd_act_data_pkts: toNum(source.fwd_act_data_pkts),
    fwd_seg_size_min: toNum(source.fwd_seg_size_min),
    active_mean: toNum(source.active_mean),
    active_std: toNum(source.active_std),
    active_max: toNum(source.active_max),
    active_min: toNum(source.active_min),
    idle_mean: toNum(source.idle_mean),
    idle_std: toNum(source.idle_std),
    idle_max: toNum(source.idle_max),
    idle_min: toNum(source.idle_min),
    hour: toNum(source.hour),
    day: toNum(source.day),
    weekday: toNum(source.weekday),
    label: $('Code5').first().json.predicted_class_dos,
    attack_type: "DOS"
  };

  return {
    json: {
      supabase_url: supabaseUrl,
      supabase_key: supabaseKey,
      table: "all_traffic_data",
      payload: row
    }
  };
});

// Return an array of 50 items
return output;
